column1: Dan's parents were overweight .  Dan was overweight as well .  The doctors told his parents it was unhealthy .  His parents understood and decided to make a change .
column2: They got themselves and Dan on a diet .

column1: Jane was working at a diner .  Suddenly , a customer barged up to the counter .  He began yelling about how long his food was taking . /// Jane didn't know how to react .
column2: Luckily , her coworker intervened and calmed the man down .

column1: Peter was a truck driver .  He was running a little behind on schedule .  Peter decided to run past the weigh station .  He was stopped by a cop .
column2: Peter ended up running late and getting a fine .
